description: Use an offensive technique on your foe.
name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

description: Protects user and reduces damage taken.
name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description: Fire three bullets at once.
name: Burst Shot

description: Restore a fair bit of health.
name: Basic Heal

description:
Swing with the utter lack of regard for consequences
that only H Face shows.

description: Enemy action. Causes enemy to flee from battle.
name: Escape

description: Fire five times in rapid succession.

description: Fire five times in rapid succession.

description:

all enemies.
